an4:108.2.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sagavacaṇḍo hoti, no paragavacaṇḍo.
an4:108.2.4_0: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, balībaddo sagavacaṇḍo, no paragavacaṇḍo;
an4:108.3.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo paragavacaṇḍo hoti, no sagavacaṇḍo?
an4:108.3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo paraparisaṁ ubbejetā hoti, no sakaparisaṁ.
an4:108.3.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo paragavacaṇḍo hoti, no sagavacaṇḍo.
an4:108.3.4_0: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, balībaddo paragavacaṇḍo, no sagavacaṇḍo;
an4:108.4.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo sagavacaṇḍo ca hoti paragavacaṇḍo ca?
an4:108.4.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sakaparisaṁ ubbejetā hoti paraparisañca.
an4:108.4.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sagavacaṇḍo ca hoti paragavacaṇḍo ca.
an4:108.4.4_0: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, balībaddo sagavacaṇḍo ca paragavacaṇḍo ca;
an4:108.5.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo neva sagavacaṇḍo hoti no paragavacaṇḍo?
an4:108.5.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo neva sakaparisaṁ ubbejetā hoti, no paraparisañca.
an4:108.5.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo neva sagavacaṇḍo hoti, no paragavacaṇḍo.
an4:108.5.4_0: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, balībaddo neva sagavacaṇḍo, no paragavacaṇḍo;
an4:108.5.6_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro balībaddūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4:109.1.8_0: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro rukkhūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4:109.2.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo pheggu hoti phegguparivāro?
an4:109.2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dussīlo hoti pāpadhammo;
an4:109.2.4_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pheggu hoti phegguparivāro.
an4:109.2.5_0: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, rukkho pheggu phegguparivāro;
an4:109.3.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo pheggu hoti sāraparivāro?
an4:109.3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo dussīlo hoti pāpadhammo;
an4:109.3.3_0: parisā ca khvassa hoti sīlavatī kalyāṇadhammā.
an4:109.3.4_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pheggu hoti sāraparivāro.
an4:109.3.5_0: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, rukkho pheggu sāraparivāro;
an4:109.4.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo sāro hoti phegguparivāro?
an4:109.4.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sīlavā hoti kalyāṇadhammo;
an4:109.4.3_0: parisā ca khvassa hoti dussīlā pāpadhammā.
an4:109.4.4_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sāro hoti phegguparivāro.
an4:109.4.5_0: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, rukkho sāro phegguparivāro;
an4:109.5.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo sāro hoti sāraparivāro?
an4:109.5.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sīlavā hoti kalyāṇadhammo;
an4:109.5.4_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sāro hoti sāraparivāro.
an4:109.5.5_0: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, rukkho sāro sāraparivāro;
an4:109.5.7_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro rukkhūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4:110.1.8_0: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, cattāro āsīvisūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4:110.2.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo āgataviso hoti, na ghoraviso?
an4:110.2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṁ kujjhati.
an4:110.2.3_0: So ca khvassa kodho na dīgharattaṁ anuseti.
an4:110.2.4_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo āgataviso hoti, na ghoraviso.
an4:110.2.5_0: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, āsīviso āgataviso, na ghoraviso;
an4:110.3.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo ghoraviso hoti, na āgataviso?
an4:110.3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na heva kho abhiṇhaṁ kujjhati.
an4:110.3.3_0: So ca khvassa kodho dīgharattaṁ anuseti.
an4:110.3.4_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ghoraviso hoti, na āgataviso.
an4:110.3.5_0: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, āsīviso ghoraviso, na āgataviso;
an4:110.4.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo āgataviso ca hoti ghoraviso ca?
an4:110.4.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo abhiṇhaṁ kujjhati.
an4:110.4.3_0: So ca khvassa kodho dīgharattaṁ anuseti.
an4:110.4.4_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo āgataviso ca hoti ghoraviso ca.
an4:110.4.5_0: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, āsīviso āgataviso ca ghoraviso ca;
an4:110.5.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo nevāgataviso hoti na ghoraviso?
an4:110.5.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo na heva kho abhiṇhaṁ kujjhati.
an4:110.5.3_0: So ca khvassa kodho na dīgharattaṁ anuseti.
an4:110.5.4_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo nevāgataviso hoti, na ghoraviso.
an4:110.5.5_0: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, āsīviso nevāgataviso na ghoraviso;
an4:110.5.7_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro āsīvisūpamā puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4:111.1.1_0: Atha kho kesi assadammasārathi yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an4:111.1.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho kesiṁ assadammasārathiṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an4:111.1.3_0: Kathaṁ pana tvaṁ, kesi, assadammaṁ vinesī”ti?
an4:111.1.4_0: “Ahaṁ kho, bhante, assadammaṁ saṇhenapi vinemi, pharusenapi vinemi, saṇhapharusenapi vinemī”ti.
an4:111.2.2_0: Kathaṁ pana, bhante, bhagavā purisadammaṁ vinetī”ti?
an4:111.2.3_0: “Ahaṁ kho, kesi, purisadammaṁ saṇhenapi vinemi, pharusenapi vinemi, saṇhapharusenapi vinemi.
an4:111.2.5_2: iti manosucaritaṁ iti manosucaritassa vipāko, iti devā,
an4:111.3.2_5: iti manoduccaritaṁ iti manoduccaritassa vipāko, iti devā,
an4:111.4.8_0: Api ca yo purisadammo saṇhena vinayaṁ na upeti,
an4:111.4.8_3: na taṁ tathāgato vattabbaṁ anusāsitabbaṁ maññati,
an4:111.4.8_4: nāpi viññū sabrahmacārī vattabbaṁ anusāsitabbaṁ maññanti.
an4:111.4.10_0: yaṁ na tathāgato vattabbaṁ anusāsitabbaṁ maññati,
an4:111.4.10_1: nāpi viññū sabrahmacārī vattabbaṁ anusāsitabbaṁ maññantī”ti.
an4:111.5.2_0: yaṁ na tathāgato vattabbaṁ anusāsitabbaṁ maññati,
an4:111.5.2_1: nāpi viññū sabrahmacārī vattabbaṁ anusāsitabbaṁ maññantīti.
an4:111.5.3_4: bhagavā dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
an4:112.1.1_2: aṅgehi samannāgato rañño bhadro assājānīyo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo,
an4:112.1.4_2: catūhi aṅgehi samannāgato rañño bhadro assājānīyo rājāraho hoti,
an4:112.2.1_2: catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti …pe…
an4:112.2.4_2: catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti …pe…
an4:113.1.1_0: “Cattārome, bhikkhave, bhadrā assājānīyā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4:113.1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco bhadro assājānīyo patodacchāyaṁ disvā saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati:
an4:113.1.4_0: ‘kiṁ nu kho maṁ ajja assadammasārathi kāraṇaṁ kāressati, kimassāhaṁ paṭikaromī’ti.
an4:113.1.5_0: Evarūpopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro assājānīyo hoti.
an4:113.1.6_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo bhadro assājānīyo santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ.
an4:113.2.1_2: idhekacco bhadro assājānīyo na heva kho patodacchāyaṁ disvā saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati,
an4:113.2.1_3: api ca kho lomavedhaviddho saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati:
an4:113.2.2_0: ‘kiṁ nu kho maṁ ajja assadammasārathi kāraṇaṁ kāressati, kimassāhaṁ paṭikaromī’ti.
an4:113.2.3_0: Evarūpopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro assājānīyo hoti.
an4:113.2.4_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo bhadro assājānīyo santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ.
an4:113.3.1_2: idhekacco bhadro assājānīyo na heva kho patodacchāyaṁ disvā saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati nāpi lomavedhaviddho saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati,
an4:113.3.1_3: api ca kho cammavedhaviddho saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati:
an4:113.3.2_0: ‘kiṁ nu kho maṁ ajja assadammasārathi kāraṇaṁ kāressati, kimassāhaṁ paṭikaromī’ti.
an4:113.3.3_0: Evarūpopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro assājānīyo hoti.
an4:113.3.4_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyo bhadro assājānīyo santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ.
an4:113.4.1_2: idhekacco bhadro assājānīyo na heva kho patodacchāyaṁ disvā saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati nāpi lomavedhaviddho
an4:113.4.1_3: saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati nāpi cammavedhaviddho saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati,
an4:113.4.1_4: api ca kho aṭṭhivedhaviddho saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati:
an4:113.4.2_0: ‘kiṁ nu kho maṁ ajja assadammasārathi kāraṇaṁ kāressati, kimassāhaṁ paṭikaromī’ti.
an4:113.4.3_0: Evarūpopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro assājānīyo hoti.
an4:113.4.4_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, catuttho bhadro assājānīyo santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ.
an4:113.4.5_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro bhadrā assājānīyā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4:113.5.1_0: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, cattārome bhadrā purisājānīyā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
an4:113.5.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco bhadro purisājānīyo suṇāti:
an4:113.5.4_0: ‘amukasmiṁ nāma gāme vā nigame vā itthī vā puriso vā dukkhito vā kālaṅkato vā’ti.
an4:113.5.7_0: Pahitatto kāyena ceva paramasaccaṁ sacchikaroti, paññāya ca ativijjha passati.
an4:113.5.8_0: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, bhadro assājānīyo patodacchāyaṁ disvā saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati;
an4:113.5.9_0: tathūpamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imaṁ bhadraṁ purisājānīyaṁ vadāmi.
an4:113.5.10_0: Evarūpopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro purisājānīyo hoti.
an4:113.5.11_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo bhadro purisājānīyo santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ.
an4:113.6.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro purisājānīyo na heva kho suṇāti:
an4:113.6.2_0: ‘amukasmiṁ nāma gāme vā nigame vā itthī vā puriso vā dukkhito vā kālaṅkato vā’ti,
an4:113.6.2_1: api ca kho sāmaṁ passati itthiṁ vā purisaṁ vā dukkhitaṁ vā kālaṅkataṁ vā.
an4:113.6.5_0: Pahitatto kāyena ceva paramasaccaṁ sacchikaroti, paññāya ca ativijjha passati.
an4:113.6.6_0: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, bhadro assājānīyo lomavedhaviddho saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati;
an4:113.6.7_0: tathūpamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imaṁ bhadraṁ purisājānīyaṁ vadāmi.
an4:113.6.8_0: Evarūpopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro purisājānīyo hoti.
an4:113.6.9_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo bhadro purisājānīyo santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ.
an4:113.7.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro purisājānīyo na heva kho suṇāti:
an4:113.7.2_0: ‘amukasmiṁ nāma gāme vā nigame vā itthī vā puriso vā dukkhito vā kālaṅkato vā’ti,
an4:113.7.2_1: nāpi sāmaṁ passati itthiṁ vā purisaṁ vā dukkhitaṁ vā kālaṅkataṁ vā,
an4:113.7.2_2: api ca khvassa ñāti vā sālohito vā dukkhito vā hoti kālaṅkato vā.
an4:113.7.5_0: Pahitatto kāyena ceva paramasaccaṁ sacchikaroti, paññāya ca ativijjha passati.
an4:113.7.6_0: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, bhadro assājānīyo cammavedhaviddho saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati;
an4:113.7.7_0: tathūpamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imaṁ bhadraṁ purisājānīyaṁ vadāmi.
an4:113.7.8_0: Evarūpopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro purisājānīyo hoti.
an4:113.7.9_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyo bhadro purisājānīyo santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ.
an4:113.8.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro purisājānīyo na heva kho suṇāti:
an4:113.8.2_0: ‘amukasmiṁ nāma gāme vā nigame vā itthī vā puriso vā dukkhito vā kālaṅkato vā’ti,
an4:113.8.2_1: nāpi sāmaṁ passati itthiṁ vā purisaṁ vā dukkhitaṁ vā kālaṅkataṁ vā,
an4:113.8.2_2: nāpissa ñāti vā sālohito vā dukkhito vā hoti kālaṅkato vā,
an4:113.8.2_3: api ca kho sāmaññeva phuṭṭho hoti sārīrikāhi vedanāhi dukkhāhi tibbāhi kharāhi kaṭukāhi asātāhi amanāpāhi pāṇaharāhi.
an4:113.8.5_0: Pahitatto kāyena ceva paramasaccaṁ sacchikaroti, paññāya ca ativijjha passati.
an4:113.8.6_0: Seyyathāpi so, bhikkhave, bhadro assājānīyo aṭṭhivedhaviddho saṁvijjati saṁvegaṁ āpajjati;
an4:113.8.7_0: tathūpamāhaṁ, bhikkhave, imaṁ bhadraṁ purisājānīyaṁ vadāmi.
an4:113.8.8_0: Evarūpopi, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhadro purisājānīyo hoti.
an4:113.8.9_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, catuttho bhadro purisājānīyo santo saṁvijjamāno lokasmiṁ.
an4:113.8.10_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro bhadrā purisājānīyā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4:114.1.1_2: aṅgehi samannāgato rañño nāgo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo,
an4:114.1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo sotā ca hoti, hantā ca, khantā ca, gantā ca.
an4:114.2.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo sotā hoti?
an4:114.2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo yamenaṁ hatthidammasārathi kāraṇaṁ kāreti—
an4:114.2.3_0: yadi vā katapubbaṁ yadi vā akatapubbaṁ—
an4:114.2.4_0: taṁ aṭṭhiṁ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasoto suṇāti.
an4:114.2.5_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo sotā hoti.
an4:114.3.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo hantā hoti?
an4:114.3.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo hantā hoti.
an4:114.4.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo khantā hoti?
an4:114.4.2_1: rañño nāgo saṅgāmagato khamo hoti sattippahārānaṁ asippahārānaṁ usuppahārānaṁ pharasuppahārānaṁ bheripaṇavasaṅkhatiṇavaninnādasaddānaṁ.
an4:114.4.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo khantā hoti.
an4:114.5.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo gantā hoti?
an4:114.5.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo yamenaṁ hatthidammasārathi disaṁ peseti—
an4:114.5.3_0: yadi vā gatapubbaṁ yadi vā agatapubbaṁ—
an4:114.5.5_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, rañño nāgo gantā hoti.
an4:114.5.6_2: catūhi aṅgehi samannāgato rañño nāgo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo,
an4:114.6.1_2: catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti …pe…
an4:114.6.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sotā ca hoti, hantā ca, khantā ca, gantā ca.
an4:114.7.2_2: bhikkhu tathāgatappavedite dhammavinaye desiyamāne aṭṭhiṁ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā ohitasoto dhammaṁ suṇāti.
an4:114.7.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sotā hoti.
an4:114.8.2_2: bhikkhu uppannaṁ kāmavitakkaṁ nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti hanati byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti,
an4:114.8.2_5: uppannuppanne pāpake akusale dhamme nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti hanati byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti.
an4:114.8.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu hantā hoti.
an4:114.9.2_2: bhikkhu khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassa jighacchāya pipāsāya,
an4:114.9.2_3: ḍaṁsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassānaṁ duruttānaṁ durāgatānaṁ vacanapathānaṁ uppannānaṁ sārīrikānaṁ
an4:114.9.2_4: vedanānaṁ dukkhānaṁ tibbānaṁ kharānaṁ kaṭukānaṁ asātānaṁ amanāpānaṁ pāṇaharānaṁ adhivāsakajātiko hoti.
an4:114.9.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khantā hoti.
an4:114.10.2_2: bhikkhu yāyaṁ disā agatapubbā iminā dīghena addhunā yadidaṁ sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṁ,
an4:114.10.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gantā hoti.
an4:114.10.4_2: catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti …pe…
an4:115.2.1_0: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidaṁ ṭhānaṁ amanāpaṁ kātuṁ;
an4:115.2.3_0: idaṁ, bhikkhave, ṭhānaṁ ubhayeneva na kattabbaṁ maññati.
an4:115.2.8_0: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, ṭhānaṁ ubhayeneva na kattabbaṁ maññati.
an4:115.3.1_0: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidaṁ ṭhānaṁ amanāpaṁ kātuṁ;
an4:115.3.3_0: imasmiṁ, bhikkhave, ṭhāne bālo ca paṇḍito ca veditabbo purisathāme purisavīriye purisaparakkame.
an4:115.3.6_0: atha carahidaṁ ṭhānaṁ kayiramānaṁ atthāya saṁvattatī’ti.
an4:115.3.8_0: Tassa taṁ ṭhānaṁ akayiramānaṁ anatthāya saṁvattati.
an4:115.3.9_0: Paṇḍito ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an4:115.3.11_0: atha carahidaṁ ṭhānaṁ kayiramānaṁ atthāya saṁvattatī’ti.
an4:115.3.13_0: Tassa taṁ ṭhānaṁ kayiramānaṁ atthāya saṁvattati.
an4:115.4.1_0: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidaṁ ṭhānaṁ manāpaṁ kātuṁ;
an4:115.4.3_0: imasmimpi, bhikkhave, ṭhāne bālo ca paṇḍito ca veditabbo purisathāme purisavīriye purisaparakkame.
an4:115.4.6_0: atha carahidaṁ ṭhānaṁ kayiramānaṁ anatthāya saṁvattatī’ti.
an4:115.4.8_0: Tassa taṁ ṭhānaṁ kayiramānaṁ anatthāya saṁvattati.
an4:115.4.9_0: Paṇḍito ca kho, bhikkhave, iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an4:115.4.11_0: atha carahidaṁ ṭhānaṁ kayiramānaṁ anatthāya saṁvattatī’ti.
an4:115.4.13_0: Tassa taṁ ṭhānaṁ akayiramānaṁ atthāya saṁvattati.
an4:115.5.1_0: Tatra, bhikkhave, yamidaṁ ṭhānaṁ manāpaṁ kātuṁ, tañca kayiramānaṁ atthāya saṁvattati—
an4:115.5.2_0: idaṁ, bhikkhave, ṭhānaṁ ubhayeneva kattabbaṁ maññati.
an4:115.5.3_0: Yampidaṁ ṭhānaṁ manāpaṁ kātuṁ, imināpi naṁ kattabbaṁ maññati;
an4:115.5.4_0: yampidaṁ ṭhānaṁ kayiramānaṁ atthāya saṁvattati, imināpi naṁ kattabbaṁ maññati.
an4:115.5.5_0: Idaṁ, bhikkhave, ṭhānaṁ ubhayeneva kattabbaṁ maññati.
an4:116.2.1_2: bhikkhuno kāyaduccaritaṁ pahīnaṁ hoti kāyasucaritaṁ bhāvitaṁ,
an4:117.1.1_0: “Catūsu, bhikkhave, ṭhānesu attarūpena appamādo sati cetaso ārakkho karaṇīyo.
an4:117.1.3_0: ‘Mā me rajanīyesu dhammesu cittaṁ rajjī’ti attarūpena appamādo sati cetaso ārakkho karaṇīyo;
an4:117.1.4_0: ‘mā me dosanīyesu dhammesu cittaṁ dussī’ti attarūpena appamādo sati cetaso ārakkho karaṇīyo;
an4:117.1.5_0: ‘mā me mohanīyesu dhammesu cittaṁ muyhī’ti attarūpena appamādo sati cetaso ārakkho karaṇīyo;
an4:117.1.6_0: ‘mā me madanīyesu dhammesu cittaṁ majjī’ti attarūpena appamādo sati cetaso ārakkho karaṇīyo.
an4:117.2.1_2: bhikkhuno rajanīyesu dhammesu cittaṁ na rajjati vītarāgattā,
an4:117.2.1_3: dosanīyesu dhammesu cittaṁ na dussati vītadosattā,
an4:117.2.1_4: mohanīyesu dhammesu cittaṁ na muyhati vītamohattā,
an4:117.2.1_5: madanīyesu dhammesu cittaṁ na majjati vītamadattā,
an4:117.2.1_6: so na chambhati na kampati na vedhati na santāsaṁ āpajjati,
an4:118.1.1_0: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassanīyāni saṁvejanīyāni ṭhānāni.
an4:118.1.3_0: ‘Idha tathāgato jāto’ti, bhikkhave, saddhassa kulaputtassa dassanīyaṁ saṁvejanīyaṁ ṭhānaṁ.
an4:118.1.7_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri saddhassa kulaputtassa dassanīyāni saṁvejanīyāni ṭhānānī”ti.
an4:121.2.3_3: kiñca taṁ yaṁ maṁ attā sīlato na upavadeyyā’ti.
an4:121.2.4_0: So attānuvādabhayassa bhīto kāyaduccaritaṁ pahāya kāyasucaritaṁ bhāveti,
an4:121.3.3_3: kiñca taṁ yaṁ maṁ pare sīlato na upavadeyyun’ti.
an4:121.3.4_0: So parānuvādabhayassa bhīto kāyaduccaritaṁ pahāya kāyasucaritaṁ bhāveti,
an4:121.4.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco passati coraṁ āgucāriṁ, rājāno gahetvā vividhā kammakāraṇā kārente,
an4:121.5.2_0: ‘yathārūpānaṁ kho pāpakānaṁ kammānaṁ hetu coraṁ āgucāriṁ rājāno gahetvā vividhā kammakāraṇā kārenti,
an4:121.5.2_3: ahañceva kho pana evarūpaṁ pāpakammaṁ kareyyaṁ,
an4:121.5.2_4: mampi rājāno gahetvā evarūpā vividhā kammakāraṇā kāreyyuṁ,
an4:121.5.4_0: So daṇḍabhayassa bhīto na paresaṁ pābhataṁ vilumpanto carati.
an4:121.6.4_0: Ahañceva kho pana kāyena duccaritaṁ careyyaṁ,
an4:121.6.4_3: kiñca taṁ yāhaṁ na kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjeyyan’ti.
an4:121.6.5_0: So duggatibhayassa bhīto kāyaduccaritaṁ pahāya kāyasucaritaṁ bhāveti,
an4:122.1.4_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri bhayāni udakorohantassa pāṭikaṅkhitabbāni.
an4:122.1.5_2: cattāri bhayāni idhekaccassa kulaputtassa imasmiṁ dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitassa pāṭikaṅkhitabbāni.
an4:122.2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
an4:122.2.3_0: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
an4:122.2.4_0: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
an4:122.2.5_0: Tamenaṁ tathā pabbajitaṁ samānaṁ sabrahmacārino ovadanti anusāsanti:
an4:122.2.8_0: ‘mayaṁ kho pubbe agāriyabhūtā samānā aññe ovadāmapi anusāsāmapi.
an4:122.2.9_0: Ime panamhākaṁ puttamattā maññe nattamattā maññe ovaditabbaṁ anusāsitabbaṁ maññantī’ti.
an4:122.2.10_0: So kupito anattamano sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
an4:122.2.11_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ūmibhayassa bhīto sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatto.
an4:122.3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
an4:122.3.3_0: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
an4:122.3.4_0: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
an4:122.3.5_0: Tamenaṁ tathā pabbajitaṁ samānaṁ sabrahmacārino ovadanti anusāsanti:
an4:122.3.8_0: ‘mayaṁ kho pubbe agāriyabhūtā samānā yaṁ icchāma taṁ khādāma, yaṁ na icchāma na taṁ khādāma;
an4:122.3.9_0: yaṁ icchāma taṁ bhuñjāma, yaṁ na icchāma na taṁ bhuñjāma;
an4:122.3.10_0: yaṁ icchāma taṁ sāyāma, yaṁ na icchāma na taṁ sāyāma;
an4:122.3.11_0: yaṁ icchāma taṁ pivāma, yaṁ na icchāma na taṁ pivāma;
an4:122.3.12_0: kappiyampi khādāma akappiyampi khādāma kappiyampi bhuñjāma akappiyampi bhuñjāma kappiyampi sāyāma akappiyampi
an4:122.3.12_2: kālepi khādāma vikālepi khādāma kālepi bhuñjāma vikālepi bhuñjāma kālepi sāyāma vikālepi sāyāma kālepi pivāma vikālepi pivāma;
an4:122.3.13_0: yampi no saddhā gahapatikā divā vikāle paṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā denti,
an4:122.3.14_0: So kupito anattamano sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
an4:122.3.15_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kumbhīlabhayassa bhīto sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatto.
an4:122.4.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
an4:122.4.4_0: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
an4:122.4.5_0: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya pavisati
an4:122.4.5_1: arakkhiteneva kāyena arakkhitāya vācāya arakkhitena cittena anupaṭṭhitāya satiyā asaṁvutehi indriyehi.
an4:122.4.6_0: So tattha passati gahapatiṁ vā gahapatiputtaṁ vā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitaṁ samaṅgībhūtaṁ paricārayamānaṁ.
an4:122.4.8_0: ‘mayaṁ kho pubbe agāriyabhūtā samānā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitā samaṅgībhūtā paricārimhā;
an4:122.4.9_0: saṁvijjanti kho pana me kule bhogā.
an4:122.4.10_0: Sakkā bhoge ca bhuñjituṁ puññāni ca kātuṁ.
an4:122.4.11_0: Yannūnāhaṁ sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattitvā bhoge ca bhuñjeyyaṁ puññāni ca kareyyan’ti.
an4:122.4.13_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āvaṭṭabhayassa bhīto sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatto.
an4:122.4.14_0: Āvaṭṭabhayanti kho, bhikkhave, pañcannetaṁ kāmaguṇānaṁ adhivacanaṁ.
an4:122.5.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco kulaputto saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti:
an4:122.5.3_0: ‘otiṇṇomhi jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi,
an4:122.5.4_0: appeva nāma imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriyā paññāyethā’ti.
an4:122.5.5_0: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā piṇḍāya pavisati
an4:122.5.5_1: arakkhiteneva kāyena arakkhitāya vācāya arakkhitena cittena anupaṭṭhitāya satiyā asaṁvutehi indriyehi.
an4:122.5.6_0: So tattha passati mātugāmaṁ dunnivatthaṁ vā duppārutaṁ vā.
an4:122.5.7_0: Tassa mātugāmaṁ disvā dunnivatthaṁ vā duppārutaṁ vā rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti.
an4:122.5.8_0: So rāgānuddhaṁsitena cittena sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
an4:122.5.9_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu susukābhayassa bhīto sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvatto.
an4:122.5.12_2: cattāri bhayāni idhekaccassa kulaputtassa imasmiṁ dhammavinaye agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajitassa pāṭikaṅkhitabbānī”ti.
an4:123.1.3_2: ekacco puggalo vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4:123.1.4_0: So tadassādeti, taṁ nikāmeti, tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati.
an4:123.1.5_0: Tattha ṭhito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihārī aparihīno kālaṁ kurumāno brahmakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
an4:123.1.7_0: Tattha puthujjano yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā nirayampi
an4:123.1.8_0: Bhagavato pana sāvako tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā tasmiṁyeva bhave parinibbāyati.
an4:123.1.9_2: viseso ayaṁ adhippayāso idaṁ nānākaraṇaṁ sutavato ariyasāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanena,
an4:123.2.1_2: idhekacco puggalo vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ
an4:123.2.1_3: samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4:123.2.2_0: So tadassādeti, taṁ nikāmeti, tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati.
an4:123.2.3_0: Tattha ṭhito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihārī aparihīno kālaṁ kurumāno ābhassarānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
an4:123.2.4_0: Ābhassarānaṁ, bhikkhave, devānaṁ dve kappā āyuppamāṇaṁ.
an4:123.2.5_0: Tattha puthujjano yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā nirayampi
an4:123.2.6_0: Bhagavato pana sāvako tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā tasmiṁyeva bhave parinibbāyati.
an4:123.2.7_2: viseso ayaṁ adhippayāso idaṁ nānākaraṇaṁ sutavato ariyasāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanena,
an4:123.3.1_2: idhekacco puggalo pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṁvedeti yaṁ taṁ ariyā ācikkhanti:
an4:123.3.1_3: ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4:123.3.2_0: So tadassādeti, taṁ nikāmeti, tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati.
an4:123.3.3_1: kālaṁ kurumāno subhakiṇhānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
an4:123.3.4_0: Subhakiṇhānaṁ, bhikkhave, devānaṁ cattāro kappā āyuppamāṇaṁ.
an4:123.3.5_0: Tattha puthujjano yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā nirayampi
an4:123.3.6_0: Bhagavato pana sāvako tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā tasmiṁyeva bhave parinibbāyati.
an4:123.3.7_2: viseso ayaṁ adhippayāso idaṁ nānākaraṇaṁ sutavato ariyasāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanena,
an4:123.4.1_2: idhekacco puggalo sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ
an4:123.4.2_0: So tadassādeti, taṁ nikāmeti, tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati.
an4:123.4.3_0: Tattha ṭhito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihārī aparihīno kālaṁ kurumāno vehapphalānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
an4:123.4.4_0: Vehapphalānaṁ, bhikkhave, devānaṁ pañca kappasatāni āyuppamāṇaṁ.
an4:123.4.5_0: Tattha puthujjano yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā nirayampi
an4:123.4.6_0: Bhagavato pana sāvako tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā tasmiṁyeva bhave parinibbāyati.
an4:123.4.7_2: viseso ayaṁ adhippayāso idaṁ nānākaraṇaṁ sutavato ariyasāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanena,
an4:123.4.8_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4:124.1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4:124.1.4_0: So yadeva tattha hoti rūpagataṁ vedanāgataṁ saññāgataṁ saṅkhāragataṁ viññāṇagataṁ,
an4:124.1.4_1: te dhamme aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato parato palokato suññato anattato samanupassati.
an4:124.1.5_0: So kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā suddhāvāsānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
an4:124.2.2_0: So yadeva tattha hoti rūpagataṁ vedanāgataṁ saññāgataṁ saṅkhāragataṁ viññāṇagataṁ,
an4:124.2.2_1: te dhamme aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato parato palokato suññato anattato samanupassati.
an4:124.2.3_0: So kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā suddhāvāsānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
an4:124.2.5_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4:125.1.3_2: ekacco puggalo mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati,
an4:125.1.3_3: tathā dutiyaṁ tathā tatiyaṁ tathā catutthaṁ.
an4:125.1.3_4: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
an4:125.1.4_0: So tadassādeti, taṁ nikāmeti, tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati.
an4:125.1.5_0: Tattha ṭhito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihārī aparihīno kālaṁ kurumāno brahmakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
an4:125.1.7_0: Tattha puthujjano yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā nirayampi
an4:125.1.8_0: Bhagavato pana sāvako tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā tasmiṁyeva bhave parinibbāyati.
an4:125.1.9_2: viseso ayaṁ adhippayāso idaṁ nānākaraṇaṁ sutavato ariyasāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanena,
an4:125.2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo karuṇāsahagatena cetasā …pe…
an4:125.2.3_0: upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati,
an4:125.2.3_1: tathā dutiyaṁ tathā tatiyaṁ tathā catutthaṁ.
an4:125.2.3_2: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
an4:125.2.4_0: So tadassādeti, taṁ nikāmeti, tena ca vittiṁ āpajjati.
an4:125.2.5_0: Tattha ṭhito tadadhimutto tabbahulavihārī aparihīno kālaṁ kurumāno ābhassarānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
an4:125.2.8_0: Vehapphalānaṁ, bhikkhave, devānaṁ pañca kappasatāni āyuppamāṇaṁ.
an4:125.2.9_0: Tattha puthujjano yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā nirayampi
an4:125.2.10_0: Bhagavato pana sāvako tattha yāvatāyukaṁ ṭhatvā yāvatakaṁ tesaṁ devānaṁ āyuppamāṇaṁ taṁ sabbaṁ khepetvā tasmiṁyeva bhave parinibbāyati.

an4:138.2.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo nikaṭṭhakāyo hoti anikaṭṭhacitto?

an4:138.2.3_0: So tattha kāmavitakkampi vitakketi byāpādavitakkampi vitakketi vihiṁsāvitakkampi vitakketi.

an4:148.1.3_0: Musāvādo, pisuṇā vācā, pharusā vācā, samphappalāpo—
an4:149.1.3_0: Saccavācā, apisuṇā vācā, saṇhā vācā, mantabhāsā—
an4:156.1.3_0: Yadā, bhikkhave, kappo saṁvaṭṭati, taṁ na sukaraṁ saṅkhātuṁ—
an4:156.2.1_0: Yadā, bhikkhave, kappo saṁvaṭṭo tiṭṭhati, taṁ na sukaraṁ saṅkhātuṁ—
an4:156.3.1_0: Yadā, bhikkhave, kappo vivaṭṭati, taṁ na sukaraṁ saṅkhātuṁ—
an4:156.4.1_0: Yadā, bhikkhave, kappo vivaṭṭo tiṭṭhati, taṁ na sukaraṁ saṅkhātuṁ—
an4:156.4.3_0: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri kappassa asaṅkhyeyyānī”ti.
an4:157.1.3_0: Kāyiko ca rogo cetasiko ca rogo.
an4:157.1.4_2: sattā kāyikena rogena ekampi vassaṁ ārogyaṁ paṭijānamānā,
an4:157.1.5_2: sattā sudullabhā lokasmiṁ ye cetasikena rogena muhuttampi ārogyaṁ paṭijānanti,
an4:157.2.5_0: So uṭṭhahati ghaṭati vāyamati anavaññappaṭilābhāya lābhasakkārasilokappaṭilābhāya.
an4:157.2.7_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro pabbajitassa rogā.
an4:157.3.2_1: na pāpikaṁ icchaṁ paṇidahissāma anavaññappaṭilābhāya lābhasakkārasilokappaṭilābhāya,
an4:157.3.2_2: na uṭṭhahissāma na ghaṭessāma na vāyamissāma anavaññappaṭilābhāya lābhasakkārasilokappaṭilābhāya,
an4:157.3.2_3: khamā bhavissāma sītassa uṇhassa jighacchāya pipāsāya ḍaṁsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassānaṁ duruttānaṁ durāgatānaṁ vacanapathānaṁ,
an4:157.3.2_4: uppannānaṁ sārīrikānaṁ vedanānaṁ dukkhānaṁ tibbānaṁ kharānaṁ kaṭukānaṁ asātānaṁ amanāpānaṁ pāṇaharānaṁ adhivāsakajātikā bhavissāmā’ti.
an4:158.1.1_0: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an4:158.1.3_0: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṁ.
an4:158.2.1_1: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā cattāro dhamme attani samanupassati,
an4:158.2.5_3: gambhīresu kho panassa ṭhānāṭhānesu paññācakkhu na kamati.
an4:158.2.6_1: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā ime cattāro dhamme attani samanupassati,
an4:158.3.1_1: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā cattāro dhamme attani samanupassati,
an4:158.3.5_0: Rāgatanuttaṁ, dosatanuttaṁ, mohatanuttaṁ, gambhīresu kho panassa ṭhānāṭhānesu paññācakkhu kamati.
an4:158.3.6_1: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā ime cattāro dhamme attani samanupassati,
an4:159.1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.
an4:159.1.3_0: Atha kho aññatarā bhikkhunī aññataraṁ purisaṁ āmantesi:
an4:159.1.4_3: upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena ayyassa ānandassa pāde sirasā vanda:
an4:159.1.6_0: Sā ayyassa ānandassa pāde sirasā vandatī’ti. Evañca vadehi:
an4:159.1.7_1: ayyo ānando yena bhikkhunupassayo yena sā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṁ upādāyā’”ti.
an4:159.1.8_1: ayye”ti kho so puriso tassā bhikkhuniyā paṭissutvā yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
an4:159.1.8_2: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an4:159.1.8_3: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so puriso āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
an4:159.2.2_0: Sā āyasmato ānandassa pāde sirasā vandati, evañca vadeti:
an4:159.2.3_1: āyasmā ānando yena bhikkhunupassayo yena sā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṁ upādāyā’”ti.
an4:159.3.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena bhikkhunupassayo yena sā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami.
an4:159.3.2_0: Addasā kho sā bhikkhunī āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
an4:159.3.4_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena sā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami;
an4:159.3.4_2: Nisajja kho āyasmā ānando taṁ bhikkhuniṁ etadavoca:
an4:159.4.3_0: Taṇhāsambhūto ayaṁ, bhagini, kāyo taṇhaṁ nissāya.
an4:159.4.5_0: Mānasambhūto ayaṁ, bhagini, kāyo mānaṁ nissāya.
an4:159.5.2_0: Āhāro pahātabbo’ti, iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ.
an4:159.5.4_0: Idha, bhagini, bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṁ āhāreti:
an4:159.5.5_0: ‘neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya,
an4:159.5.5_1: yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā yāpanāya vihiṁsūparatiyā brahmacariyānuggahāya.
an4:159.5.5_4: Yātrā ca me bhavissati anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cā’ti.
an4:159.5.6_0: So aparena samayena āhāraṁ nissāya āhāraṁ pajahati.
an4:159.5.7_0: ‘Āhārasambhūto ayaṁ, bhagini, kāyo āhāraṁ nissāya āhāro pahātabbo’ti,
an4:159.5.8_0: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
an4:159.6.2_0: Taṇhā pahātabbā’ti, iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ.
an4:159.6.5_0: ‘itthannāmo kira bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī’ti.
an4:159.6.7_0: ‘kudāssu nāma ahampi āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissāmī’ti.
an4:159.6.8_0: So aparena samayena taṇhaṁ nissāya taṇhaṁ pajahati.
an4:159.6.9_0: ‘Taṇhāsambhūto ayaṁ, bhagini, kāyo taṇhaṁ nissāya taṇhā pahātabbā’ti,
an4:159.6.10_0: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
an4:159.7.2_0: Māno pahātabbo’ti, iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ.
an4:159.7.5_0: ‘itthannāmo kira bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī’ti.
an4:159.7.7_0: ‘so hi nāma āyasmā āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissati;
an4:159.7.9_0: So aparena samayena mānaṁ nissāya mānaṁ pajahati.
an4:159.7.10_0: ‘Mānasambhūto ayaṁ, bhagini, kāyo, mānaṁ nissāya māno pahātabbo’ti,
an4:159.7.11_0: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
an4:159.9.1_0: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī mañcakā vuṭṭhahitvā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā āyasmato ānandassa pādesu sirasā nipatitvā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
an4:159.9.2_0: “accayo maṁ, bhante, accagamā, yathābālaṁ yathāmūḷhaṁ yathāakusalaṁ, yāhaṁ evamakāsiṁ.
an4:159.9.3_0: Tassā me, bhante, ayyo ānando accayaṁ accayato paṭiggaṇhātu, āyatiṁ saṁvarāyā”ti.
an4:159.9.4_0: “Taggha taṁ, bhagini, accayo accagamā, yathābālaṁ yathāmūḷhaṁ yathāakusalaṁ, yā tvaṁ evamakāsi.
an4:159.9.6_1: ariyassa vinaye yo accayaṁ accayato disvā yathādhammaṁ paṭikaroti āyatiṁ saṁvaraṁ āpajjatī”ti.
an4:160.1.1_2: loke tiṭṭhamāno sugatavinayo vā tadassa bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ.
an4:160.2.2_2: tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā.
an4:160.3.2_0: So dhammaṁ deseti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ,
an4:160.3.4_2: loke tiṭṭhamāno sugatavinayo vā tadassa bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānanti.
an4:160.4.1_0: Cattārome, bhikkhave, dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattanti.
an4:160.4.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhū duggahitaṁ suttantaṁ pariyāpuṇanti dunnikkhittehi padabyañjanehi.
an4:160.4.4_0: Dunnikkhittassa, bhikkhave, padabyañjanassa atthopi dunnayo hoti.
an4:160.4.5_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an4:160.5.1_2: bhikkhū dubbacā honti dovacassakaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgatā akkhamā appadakkhiṇaggāhino anusāsaniṁ.
an4:160.5.2_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an4:160.6.1_2: ye te bhikkhū bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā,
an4:160.6.1_3: te na sakkaccaṁ suttantaṁ paraṁ vācenti.
an4:160.6.2_0: Tesaṁ accayena chinnamūlako suttanto hoti appaṭisaraṇo.
an4:160.6.3_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an4:160.7.1_5: na vīriyaṁ ārabhanti appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an4:160.7.3_3: na vīriyaṁ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an4:160.7.4_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an4:160.7.5_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro dhammā saddhammassa sammosāya antaradhānāya saṁvattantīti.
an4:160.8.1_0: Cattārome, bhikkhave, dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṁvattanti.
an4:160.8.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhū suggahitaṁ suttantaṁ pariyāpuṇanti sunikkhittehi padabyañjanehi.
an4:160.8.4_0: Sunikkhittassa, bhikkhave, padabyañjanassa atthopi sunayo hoti.
an4:160.8.5_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo dhammo saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an4:160.9.1_2: bhikkhū suvacā honti sovacassakaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgatā khamā padakkhiṇaggāhino anusāsaniṁ.
an4:160.9.2_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an4:160.10.1_2: ye te bhikkhū bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā,
an4:160.10.2_0: Tesaṁ accayena nacchinnamūlako suttanto hoti sappaṭisaraṇo.
an4:160.10.3_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an4:160.11.1_2: therā bhikkhū na bāhulikā honti na sāthalikā,
an4:160.11.1_5: vīriyaṁ ārabhanti appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an4:160.11.3_0: Sāpi hoti na bāhulikā na sāthalikā,
an4:160.11.3_3: vīriyaṁ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an4:160.11.4_0: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṁvattati.
an4:160.11.5_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṁvattantī”ti.
an4:162.2.1_0: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā?
an4:162.2.3_0: Pakatiyāpi tibbadosajātiko hoti, abhikkhaṇaṁ dosajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
an4:162.2.4_0: Pakatiyāpi tibbamohajātiko hoti, abhikkhaṇaṁ mohajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
an4:162.2.7_0: So imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ muduttā dandhaṁ ānantariyaṁ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an4:162.2.8_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā.
an4:162.3.1_0: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā?
an4:162.3.3_0: Pakatiyāpi tibbadosajātiko hoti, abhikkhaṇaṁ dosajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
an4:162.3.4_0: Pakatiyāpi tibbamohajātiko hoti, abhikkhaṇaṁ mohajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
an4:162.3.7_0: So imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ adhimattattā khippaṁ ānantariyaṁ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an4:162.3.8_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā.
an4:162.4.1_0: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā?
an4:162.4.3_0: Pakatiyāpi na tibbadosajātiko hoti, nābhikkhaṇaṁ dosajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
an4:162.4.4_0: Pakatiyāpi na tibbamohajātiko hoti, nābhikkhaṇaṁ mohajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
an4:162.4.7_0: So imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ muduttā dandhaṁ ānantariyaṁ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an4:162.4.8_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā.
an4:162.5.1_0: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā?
an4:162.5.3_0: Pakatiyāpi na tibbadosajātiko hoti, nābhikkhaṇaṁ dosajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
an4:162.5.4_0: Pakatiyāpi na tibbamohajātiko hoti, nābhikkhaṇaṁ mohajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
an4:162.5.7_0: So imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ adhimattattā khippaṁ ānantariyaṁ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an4:162.5.8_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā.
an4:163.2.1_0: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā?
an4:163.2.3_0: maraṇasaññā kho panassa ajjhattaṁ sūpaṭṭhitā hoti.
an4:163.2.4_0: So imāni pañca sekhabalāni upanissāya viharati—
an4:163.2.8_0: So imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ muduttā dandhaṁ ānantariyaṁ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an4:163.2.9_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā.
an4:163.3.1_0: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā?
an4:163.3.3_0: maraṇasaññā kho panassa ajjhattaṁ sūpaṭṭhitā hoti.
an4:163.3.4_0: So imāni pañca sekhabalāni upanissāya viharati—
an4:163.3.8_0: So imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ adhimattattā khippaṁ ānantariyaṁ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an4:163.3.9_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā.
an4:163.4.1_0: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā?
an4:163.4.2_1: bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati;
an4:163.4.3_0: vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati;
an4:163.4.4_0: pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṁvedeti yaṁ taṁ ariyā ācikkhanti:
an4:163.4.4_1: ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati;
an4:163.4.5_0: sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ
an4:163.4.6_0: So imāni pañca sekhabalāni upanissāya viharati—
an4:163.4.10_0: So imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ muduttā dandhaṁ ānantariyaṁ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an4:163.4.11_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā.
an4:163.5.1_0: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā?
an4:163.5.2_2: bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati …pe…
an4:163.5.3_0: So imāni pañca sekhabalāni upanissāya viharati—
an4:163.5.7_0: So imesaṁ pañcannaṁ indriyānaṁ adhimattattā khippaṁ ānantariyaṁ pāpuṇāti āsavānaṁ khayāya.
an4:163.5.8_0: Ayaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā.
an4:164.1.3_0: Akkhamā paṭipadā, khamā paṭipadā, damā paṭipadā, samā paṭipadā.
an4:164.1.5_0: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco akkosantaṁ paccakkosati, rosantaṁ paṭirosati, bhaṇḍantaṁ paṭibhaṇḍati.
an4:164.3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī;
an4:164.3.3_0: yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ,
an4:164.3.8_0: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī;
an4:164.3.9_0: yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ manindriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ,
an4:164.4.2_2: bhikkhu uppannaṁ kāmavitakkaṁ nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti sameti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṁ gameti;

an4:170.1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṁ viharati ghositārāme.

an4:170.1.5_0: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato ānandassa paccassosuṁ.
an4:170.2.1_1: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā mama santike arahattappattiṁ byākaroti,
an4:170.3.2_0: Idha, āvuso, bhikkhu samathapubbaṅgamaṁ vipassanaṁ bhāveti.
an4:170.3.3_0: Tassa samathapubbaṅgamaṁ vipassanaṁ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati.
an4:170.3.4_0: So taṁ maggaṁ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.
an4:170.3.5_0: Tassa taṁ maggaṁ āsevato bhāvayato bahulīkaroto saṁyojanāni pahīyanti, anusayā byantīhonti.
an4:170.4.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṁ samathaṁ bhāveti.
an4:170.4.2_0: Tassa vipassanāpubbaṅgamaṁ samathaṁ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati.
an4:170.4.3_0: So taṁ maggaṁ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.

an4:170.5.2_0: Tassa samathavipassanaṁ yuganaddhaṁ bhāvayato maggo sañjāyati.

an4:170.6.2_0: Hoti so, āvuso, samayo yaṁ taṁ cittaṁ ajjhattameva santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
an4:170.6.4_0: So taṁ maggaṁ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti.

an4:175.1.2_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā upavāṇo āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
an4:175.2.1_0: “Kiṁ nu kho, āvuso sāriputta, vijjāyantakaro hotī”ti?
an4:175.10.1_0: “‘Kiṁ nu kho, āvuso sāriputta, vijjāyantakaro hotī’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
an4:175.10.3_0: ‘Kiṁ panāvuso sāriputta, caraṇenantakaro hotī’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
an4:175.10.5_0: ‘Kiṁ panāvuso sāriputta, vijjācaraṇenantakaro hotī’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
an4:175.10.7_0: ‘Kiṁ panāvuso sāriputta, aññatra vijjācaraṇenantakaro hotī’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
an4:175.11.1_0: “Vijjāya ce, āvuso, antakaro abhavissa, saupādānova samāno antakaro abhavissa.
an4:175.11.2_0: Caraṇena ce, āvuso, antakaro abhavissa, saupādānova samāno antakaro abhavissa.
an4:175.11.3_0: Vijjācaraṇena ce, āvuso, antakaro abhavissa, saupādānova samāno antakaro abhavissa.
an4:175.11.4_0: Aññatra vijjācaraṇena ce, āvuso, antakaro abhavissa, puthujjano antakaro abhavissa.
an4:175.11.6_0: Caraṇavipanno kho, āvuso, yathābhūtaṁ na jānāti na passati.
an4:176.1.1_0: “Saddho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ sammā āyācamāno āyāceyya:
an4:176.1.3_0: Esā, bhikkhave, tulā etaṁ pamāṇaṁ mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, yadidaṁ sāriputtamoggallānā.
an4:176.2.1_0: Saddhā, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī evaṁ sammā āyācamānā āyāceyya:
an4:176.2.2_0: ‘tādisā homi yādisā khemā ca bhikkhunī uppalavaṇṇā cā’ti.
an4:176.2.3_2: tulā etaṁ pamāṇaṁ mama sāvikānaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ,
an4:176.2.3_3: yadidaṁ khemā ca bhikkhunī uppalavaṇṇā ca.
an4:176.3.1_0: Saddho, bhikkhave, upāsako evaṁ sammā āyācamāno āyāceyya:
an4:176.3.2_0: ‘tādiso homi yādiso citto ca gahapati hatthako ca āḷavako’ti.
an4:176.3.3_2: tulā etaṁ pamāṇaṁ mama sāvakānaṁ upāsakānaṁ,
an4:176.3.3_3: yadidaṁ citto ca gahapati hatthako ca āḷavako.
an4:176.4.1_0: Saddhā, bhikkhave, upāsikā evaṁ sammā āyācamānā āyāceyya:
an4:176.4.2_0: ‘tādisā homi yādisā khujjuttarā ca upāsikā veḷukaṇḍakiyā ca nandamātā’ti.
an4:176.4.3_2: tulā etaṁ pamāṇaṁ mama sāvikānaṁ upāsikānaṁ,
an4:176.4.3_3: yadidaṁ khujjuttarā ca upāsikā veḷukaṇḍakiyā ca nandamātā”ti.
an4:177.1.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā rāhulo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an4:177.1.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho āyasmantaṁ rāhulaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
an4:177.2.1_0: “Yā ca, rāhula, ajjhattikā pathavīdhātu yā ca bāhirā pathavīdhātu, pathavīdhāturevesā.
an4:177.2.2_0: ‘Taṁ netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti, evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
an4:177.2.3_0: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā pathavīdhātuyā nibbindati, pathavīdhātuyā cittaṁ virājeti.
an4:177.3.1_0: Yā ca, rāhula, ajjhattikā āpodhātu yā ca bāhirā āpodhātu, āpodhāturevesā.
an4:177.3.2_0: ‘Taṁ netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti, evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
an4:177.3.3_0: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā āpodhātuyā nibbindati, āpodhātuyā cittaṁ virājeti.
an4:177.4.1_0: Yā ca, rāhula, ajjhattikā tejodhātu yā ca bāhirā tejodhātu, tejodhāturevesā.
an4:177.4.2_0: ‘Taṁ netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti, evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
an4:177.4.3_0: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā tejodhātuyā nibbindati, tejodhātuyā cittaṁ virājeti.
an4:177.5.1_0: Yā ca, rāhula, ajjhattikā vāyodhātu yā ca bāhirā vāyodhātu, vāyodhāturevesā.
an4:177.5.2_0: ‘Taṁ netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti, evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṁ.
an4:177.5.3_0: Evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya disvā vāyodhātuyā nibbindati, vāyodhātuyā cittaṁ virājeti.
an4:177.6.1_1: bhikkhu imāsu catūsu dhātūsu nevattānaṁ na attaniyaṁ samanupassati,
an4:178.1.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ santaṁ cetovimuttiṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4:178.1.5_0: Tassa sakkāyanirodhaṁ manasi karoto sakkāyanirodhe cittaṁ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati nādhimuccati.
an4:178.1.6_0: Tassa kho evaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na sakkāyanirodho pāṭikaṅkho.
an4:178.1.7_3: tassa so hattho sajjeyyapi gaṇheyyapi bajjheyyapi;
an4:178.1.8_0: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ santaṁ cetovimuttiṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4:178.1.10_0: Tassa sakkāyanirodhaṁ manasi karoto sakkāyanirodhe cittaṁ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati nādhimuccati.
an4:178.1.11_0: Tassa kho evaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na sakkāyanirodho pāṭikaṅkho.
an4:178.2.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ santaṁ cetovimuttiṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4:178.2.3_0: Tassa sakkāyanirodhaṁ manasi karoto sakkāyanirodhe cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati.
an4:178.2.4_0: Tassa kho evaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sakkāyanirodho pāṭikaṅkho.
an4:178.2.5_3: tassa so hattho neva sajjeyya na gaṇheyya na bajjheyya;
an4:178.2.6_0: evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ santaṁ cetovimuttiṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4:178.2.8_0: Tassa sakkāyanirodhaṁ manasi karoto sakkāyanirodhe cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati.
an4:178.2.9_0: Tassa kho evaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno sakkāyanirodho pāṭikaṅkho.
an4:178.3.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ santaṁ cetovimuttiṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4:178.3.3_0: Tassa avijjāppabhedaṁ manasi karoto avijjāppabhede cittaṁ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati nādhimuccati.
an4:178.3.4_0: Tassa kho evaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na avijjāppabhedo pāṭikaṅkho.
an4:178.3.6_0: Tassā puriso yāni ceva āyamukhāni tāni pidaheyya,
an4:178.3.6_2: devo ca na sammā dhāraṁ anuppaveccheyya.
an4:178.3.7_0: Evañhi tassā, bhikkhave, jambāliyā na āḷippabhedo pāṭikaṅkho.
an4:178.3.8_0: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ santaṁ cetovimuttiṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4:178.3.10_0: Tassa avijjāppabhedaṁ manasi karoto avijjāppabhede cittaṁ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati nādhimuccati.
an4:178.3.11_0: Tassa kho evaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno na avijjāppabhedo pāṭikaṅkho.
an4:178.4.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ santaṁ cetovimuttiṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4:178.4.3_0: Tassa avijjāppabhedaṁ manasi karoto avijjāppabhede cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati.
an4:178.4.4_0: Tassa kho evaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno avijjāppabhedo pāṭikaṅkho.
an4:178.4.6_0: Tassā puriso yāni ceva āyamukhāni tāni vivareyya,
an4:178.4.7_0: Evañhi tassā, bhikkhave, jambāliyā āḷippabhedo pāṭikaṅkho.
an4:178.4.8_0: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññataraṁ santaṁ cetovimuttiṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4:178.4.10_0: Tassa avijjāppabhedaṁ manasi karoto avijjāppabhede cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati adhimuccati.
an4:178.4.11_0: Tassa kho evaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno avijjāppabhedo pāṭikaṅkho.
an4:178.4.12_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
an4:179.1.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami;
an4:179.1.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an4:179.1.2_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
an4:179.1.3_3: yena m’idhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme na parinibbāyantī”ti?
an4:179.2.1_1: sattā imā hānabhāgiyā saññāti yathābhūtaṁ nappajānanti,
an4:179.2.2_3: yena m’idhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme na parinibbāyantī”ti.
an4:179.3.1_0: “Ko panāvuso sāriputta, hetu ko paccayo, yena m’idhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme parinibbāyantī”ti?
an4:179.3.2_1: sattā imā hānabhāgiyā saññāti yathābhūtaṁ pajānanti,
an4:179.3.3_3: yena m’idhekacce sattā diṭṭheva dhamme parinibbāyantī”ti.
an4:180.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā bhoganagare viharati ānandacetiye.
an4:180.1.7_0: taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
an4:180.1.8_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
an4:180.2.3_0: ‘sammukhā metaṁ, āvuso, bhagavato sutaṁ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ—
an4:180.2.4_0: ayaṁ dhammo, ayaṁ vinayo, idaṁ satthusāsanan’ti.
an4:180.2.5_0: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhāsitaṁ neva abhinanditabbaṁ nappaṭikkositabbaṁ.
an4:180.2.6_0: Anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā tāni padabyañjanāni sādhukaṁ uggahetvā sutte otāretabbāni,
an4:180.2.7_0: Tāni ce sutte otāriyamānāni vinaye sandassiyamānāni na ceva sutte otaranti na vinaye sandissanti,
an4:180.2.8_0: ‘addhā idaṁ na ceva tassa bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa;
an4:180.3.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ vadeyya:
an4:180.3.2_0: ‘sammukhā metaṁ, āvuso, bhagavato sutaṁ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ—
an4:180.3.3_0: ayaṁ dhammo, ayaṁ vinayo, idaṁ satthusāsanan’ti.
an4:180.3.4_0: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhāsitaṁ neva abhinanditabbaṁ nappaṭikkositabbaṁ.
an4:180.3.5_0: Anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā tāni padabyañjanāni sādhukaṁ uggahetvā sutte otāretabbāni,
an4:180.3.6_0: Tāni ce sutte otāriyamānāni vinaye sandassiyamānāni sutte ceva otaranti vinaye ca sandissanti,
an4:180.3.7_0: ‘addhā idaṁ tassa bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa;
an4:180.4.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ vadeyya:
an4:180.4.2_0: ‘asukasmiṁ nāma āvāse saṅgho viharati sathero sapāmokkho.
an4:180.4.3_0: Tassa me saṅghassa sammukhā sutaṁ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ—
an4:180.4.4_0: ayaṁ dhammo, ayaṁ vinayo, idaṁ satthusāsanan’ti.
an4:180.4.5_0: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhāsitaṁ neva abhinanditabbaṁ nappaṭikkositabbaṁ.
an4:180.4.6_0: Anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā tāni padabyañjanāni sādhukaṁ uggahetvā sutte otāretabbāni,
an4:180.4.7_0: Tāni ce sutte otāriyamānāni vinaye sandassiyamānāni na ceva sutte otaranti na vinaye sandissanti,
an4:180.4.8_0: ‘addhā idaṁ na ceva tassa bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa;
an4:180.5.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ vadeyya:
an4:180.5.2_0: ‘asukasmiṁ nāma āvāse saṅgho viharati sathero sapāmokkho.

an4:180.5.5_0: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhāsitaṁ neva abhinanditabbaṁ nappaṭikkositabbaṁ.

an4:180.5.7_1: vinaye sandassiyamānāni sutte ceva otaranti vinaye ca sandissanti,

an4:180.6.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ vadeyya:
an4:180.6.2_0: ‘asukasmiṁ nāma āvāse sambahulā therā bhikkhū viharanti bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā.
an4:180.6.3_0: Tesaṁ me therānaṁ sammukhā sutaṁ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṁ—
an4:180.6.4_0: ayaṁ dhammo, ayaṁ vinayo, idaṁ satthusāsanan’ti.
an4:180.6.5_0: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhāsitaṁ neva abhinanditabbaṁ nappaṭikkositabbaṁ.

an4:181.1.1_2: aṅgehi samannāgato yodhājīvo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo,
an4:181.1.4_2: catūhi aṅgehi samannāgato yodhājīvo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo,
an4:181.1.5_2: catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
an4:181.2.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti …pe… samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
an4:181.2.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ṭhānakusalo hoti.
an4:181.3.2_2: bhikkhu yaṁ kiñci rūpaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
an4:181.3.2_5: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passati.
an4:181.3.6_0: yaṁ kiñci viññāṇaṁ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṁ ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṁ vā sukhumaṁ vā hīnaṁ vā paṇītaṁ vā yaṁ dūre santike vā,
an4:181.3.6_3: na meso attā’ti evametaṁ yathābhūtaṁ sammappaññāya passati.
an4:181.3.7_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dūrepātī hoti.
an4:181.4.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkhaṇavedhī hoti.
an4:181.5.1_0: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mahato kāyassa padāletā hoti?
an4:181.5.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mahantaṁ avijjākkhandhaṁ padāletā.
an4:181.5.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mahato kāyassa padāletā hoti.
an4:181.5.4_2: catūhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti …pe…
an4:182.1.2_0: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṁ.
an4:182.2.3_0: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṁ;
an4:182.2.5_0: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṁ;
an4:182.2.7_0: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṁ;
an4:182.2.8_0: ‘yāni kho pana tāni pubbe attanā katāni pāpakāni kammāni saṅkilesikāni ponobhavikāni sadarāni dukkhavipākāni āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇikāni,
an4:182.2.8_1: tesaṁ vipāko mā nibbattī’ti natthi koci pāṭibhogo—
an4:182.2.9_0: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṁ.
an4:182.3.1_0: Imesaṁ kho, bhikkhave, catunnaṁ dhammānaṁ natthi koci pāṭibhogo—
an4:182.3.2_0: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmin”ti.
an4:183.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
an4:183.1.2_0: Atha kho vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an4:183.1.3_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an4:183.1.3_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an4:183.2.3_0: evaṁ me diṭṭhanti, natthi tato doso;
an4:183.2.5_0: evaṁ me sutanti, natthi tato doso;
an4:183.2.7_0: evaṁ me mutanti, natthi tato doso;
an4:183.2.9_0: evaṁ me viññātanti, natthi tato doso’”ti.
an4:183.3.2_0: na panāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, sabbaṁ diṭṭhaṁ na bhāsitabbanti vadāmi;
an4:183.3.3_0: nāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, sabbaṁ sutaṁ bhāsitabbanti vadāmi;
an4:183.3.4_0: na panāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, sabbaṁ sutaṁ na bhāsitabbanti vadāmi;
an4:183.3.5_0: nāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, sabbaṁ mutaṁ bhāsitabbanti vadāmi;
an4:183.3.6_0: na panāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, sabbaṁ mutaṁ na bhāsitabbanti vadāmi;
an4:183.3.7_0: nāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, sabbaṁ viññātaṁ bhāsitabbanti vadāmi;
an4:183.3.8_0: na panāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa, sabbaṁ viññātaṁ na bhāsitabbanti vadāmi.
an4:183.8.1_0: Atha kho vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmīti.
an4:184.1.1_0: Atha kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
an4:184.1.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
an4:184.1.2_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho jāṇussoṇi brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an4:184.2.2_0: ‘natthi yo maraṇadhammo samāno na bhāyati, na santāsaṁ āpajjati maraṇassā’”ti.
an4:184.2.3_0: “Atthi, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno bhāyati, santāsaṁ āpajjati maraṇassa;
an4:184.2.4_0: atthi pana, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno na bhāyati, na santāsaṁ āpajjati maraṇassa.
an4:184.3.1_0: Katamo ca, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno bhāyati, santāsaṁ āpajjati maraṇassa?
an4:184.3.2_1: ekacco kāmesu avītarāgo hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipāso avigatapariḷāho avigatataṇho.
an4:184.3.4_0: Tassa aññatarena gāḷhena rogātaṅkena phuṭṭhassa evaṁ hoti:
an4:184.3.5_0: ‘piyā vata maṁ kāmā jahissanti, piye cāhaṁ kāme jahissāmī’ti.
an4:184.3.6_0: So socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṁ kandati, sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an4:184.3.7_0: Ayaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno bhāyati, santāsaṁ āpajjati maraṇassa.
an4:184.4.1_1: idhekacco kāye avītarāgo hoti avigatacchando avigatapemo avigatapipāso avigatapariḷāho avigatataṇho.
an4:184.4.3_0: Tassa aññatarena gāḷhena rogātaṅkena phuṭṭhassa evaṁ hoti:
an4:184.4.4_0: ‘piyo vata maṁ kāyo jahissati, piyañcāhaṁ kāyaṁ jahissāmī’ti.
an4:184.4.5_0: So socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṁ kandati, sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an4:184.4.6_0: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno bhāyati, santāsaṁ āpajjati maraṇassa.
an4:184.5.1_1: idhekacco akatakalyāṇo hoti akatakusalo akatabhīruttāṇo katapāpo kataluddo katakibbiso.
an4:184.5.3_0: Tassa aññatarena gāḷhena rogātaṅkena phuṭṭhassa evaṁ hoti:
an4:184.5.4_0: ‘akataṁ vata me kalyāṇaṁ, akataṁ kusalaṁ, akataṁ bhīruttāṇaṁ;
an4:184.5.5_0: kataṁ pāpaṁ, kataṁ luddaṁ, kataṁ kibbisaṁ.
an4:184.5.6_1: akatakalyāṇānaṁ akatakusalānaṁ akatabhīruttāṇānaṁ katapāpānaṁ kataluddānaṁ katakibbisānaṁ gati taṁ gatiṁ pecca gacchāmī’ti.
an4:184.5.7_0: So socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṁ kandati, sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an4:184.5.8_0: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno bhāyati, santāsaṁ āpajjati maraṇassa.
an4:184.6.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco kaṅkhī hoti vicikicchī aniṭṭhaṅgato saddhamme.
an4:184.6.3_0: Tassa aññatarena gāḷhena rogātaṅkena phuṭṭhassa evaṁ hoti:
an4:184.6.5_0: So socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṁ kandati, sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an4:184.6.6_0: Ayampi kho, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno bhāyati, santāsaṁ āpajjati maraṇassa.
an4:184.6.7_0: Ime kho, brāhmaṇa, cattāro maraṇadhammā samānā bhāyanti, santāsaṁ āpajjanti maraṇassa.
an4:184.7.1_0: Katamo ca, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno na bhāyati, na santāsaṁ āpajjati maraṇassa?
an4:184.7.2_1: ekacco kāmesu vītarāgo hoti vigatacchando vigatapemo vigatapipāso vigatapariḷāho vigatataṇho.
an4:184.7.4_0: Tassa aññatarena gāḷhena rogātaṅkena phuṭṭhassa na evaṁ hoti:
an4:184.7.5_0: ‘piyā vata maṁ kāmā jahissanti, piye cāhaṁ kāme jahissāmī’ti.
an4:184.7.6_0: So na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattāḷiṁ kandati, na sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an4:184.7.7_0: Ayaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, maraṇadhammo samāno na bhāyati, na santāsaṁ āpajjati maraṇassa.

an4:184.10.5_0: So na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattāḷiṁ kandati, na sammohaṁ āpajjati.

an4:184.11.1_4: upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
an4:185.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
an4:185.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā abhiññātā abhiññātā paribbājakā sippinikātīre paribbājakārāme paṭivasanti,
an4:185.1.2_1: seyyathidaṁ annabhāro varadharo sakuludāyī ca paribbājako aññe ca abhiññātā abhiññātā paribbājakā.
an4:185.1.3_0: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena sippinikātīre paribbājakārāmo tenupasaṅkami.
an4:185.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena tesaṁ aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ sannisinnānaṁ sannipatitānaṁ ayamantarā kathā udapādi:
an4:185.2.3_0: Atha kho bhagavā yena te paribbājakā tenupasaṅkami;
an4:185.2.3_2: Nisajja kho bhagavā te paribbājake etadavoca:
an4:185.3.1_0: “Kāya nuttha, paribbājakā, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā, kā ca pana vo antarākathā vippakatā”ti?
an4:185.3.2_0: “Idha, bho gotama, amhākaṁ sannisinnānaṁ sannipatitānaṁ ayamantarākathā udapādi:
an4:185.4.1_0: “Cattārimāni, paribbājakā, brāhmaṇasaccāni mayā sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā paveditāni.
an4:185.4.5_0: Iti vadaṁ brāhmaṇo saccaṁ āha, no musā.
an4:185.4.7_0: Api ca yadeva tattha saccaṁ tadabhiññāya pāṇānaṁyeva anuddayāya anukampāya paṭipanno hoti.
an4:185.5.3_0: Iti vadaṁ brāhmaṇo saccamāha, no musā.
an4:185.5.5_0: Api ca yadeva tattha saccaṁ tadabhiññāya kāmānaṁyeva nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
an4:185.6.2_0: ‘sabbe bhavā aniccā …pe… tadabhiññāya bhavānaṁyeva nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya paṭipanno hoti.
an4:185.7.2_0: ‘nāhaṁ kvacani kassaci kiñcanatasmiṁ na ca mama kvacani katthaci kiñcanatatthī’ti.
an4:185.7.3_0: Iti vadaṁ brāhmaṇo saccaṁ āha, no musā.
an4:185.7.5_0: Api ca yadeva tattha saccaṁ tadabhiññāya ākiñcaññaṁyeva paṭipadaṁ paṭipanno hoti.
an4:185.7.6_0: Imāni kho, paribbājakā, cattāri brāhmaṇasaccāni mayā sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā paveditānī”ti.
an4:186.1.1_0: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an4:186.1.1_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an4:186.1.2_0: “kena nu kho, bhante, loko nīyati, kena loko parikassati, kassa ca uppannassa vasaṁ gacchatī”ti?
an4:186.2.2_0: Bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu, ummaggo, bhaddakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ, kalyāṇī paripucchā.
an4:186.2.4_0: ‘kena nu kho, bhante, loko nīyati, kena loko parikassati, kassa ca uppannassa vasaṁ gacchatī’”ti?
an4:186.2.6_0: “Cittena kho, bhikkhu, loko nīyati, cittena parikassati, cittassa uppannassa vasaṁ gacchatī”ti.
an4:186.3.1_1: bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṁ uttari pañhaṁ apucchi:
an4:186.3.3_0: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bahussuto dhammadharo hotī”ti?
an4:186.4.2_0: Bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu ummaggo, bhaddakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ, kalyāṇī paripucchā.
an4:186.4.5_0: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, bahussuto dhammadharo hotī’”ti?
an4:186.4.8_0: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthā, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ.
an4:186.4.9_1: gāthāya atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti bahussuto dhammadharoti alaṁvacanāyā”ti.
an4:186.5.1_1: bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṁ uttari pañhaṁ apucchi:
an4:186.5.3_0: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, sutavā nibbedhikapañño hotī”ti?
an4:186.6.2_0: Bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu, ummaggo, bhaddakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ, kalyāṇī paripucchā.
an4:186.6.5_0: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, sutavā nibbedhikapañño hotī’”ti?
an4:186.6.7_0: “Idha, bhikkhu, bhikkhuno ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti sutaṁ hoti, paññāya cassa atthaṁ ativijjha passati;
an4:186.6.8_0: ‘ayaṁ dukkhasamudayo’ti sutaṁ hoti, paññāya cassa atthaṁ ativijjha passati;
an4:186.6.9_0: ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodho’ti sutaṁ hoti, paññāya cassa atthaṁ ativijjha passati;
an4:186.6.10_0: ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti sutaṁ hoti, paññāya cassa atthaṁ ativijjha passati.
an4:186.6.11_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, sutavā nibbedhikapañño hotī”ti.
an4:186.7.1_1: bhante”ti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā bhagavantaṁ uttari pañhaṁ apucchi:
an4:186.7.3_0: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, paṇḍito mahāpañño hotī”ti?
an4:186.8.2_0: Bhaddako kho te, bhikkhu, ummaggo, bhaddakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ, kalyāṇī paripucchā.
an4:186.8.5_0: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, paṇḍito mahāpañño hotī’”ti?
an4:186.8.7_1: paṇḍito mahāpañño nevattabyābādhāya ceteti na parabyābādhāya ceteti na ubhayabyābādhāya ceteti attahitaparahitaubhayahitasabbalokahitameva
an4:186.8.8_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, paṇḍito mahāpañño hotī”ti.
an4:187.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
an4:187.1.2_0: Atha kho vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;

an4:187.1.3_1: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an4:187.2.1_0: “Jāneyya nu kho, bho gotama, asappuriso asappurisaṁ:
an4:187.2.3_0: “Aṭṭhānaṁ kho etaṁ, brāhmaṇa, anavakāso yaṁ asappuriso asappurisaṁ jāneyya:
an4:187.2.7_0: “Etampi kho, brāhmaṇa, aṭṭhānaṁ anavakāso yaṁ asappuriso sappurisaṁ jāneyya:
an4:187.2.9_0: “Jāneyya nu kho, bho gotama, sappuriso sappurisaṁ:
an4:187.2.11_0: “Ṭhānaṁ kho etaṁ, brāhmaṇa, vijjati yaṁ sappuriso sappurisaṁ jāneyya:
an4:187.2.15_0: “Etampi kho, brāhmaṇa, ṭhānaṁ vijjati yaṁ sappuriso asappurisaṁ jāneyya:
an4:187.3.3_0: ‘aṭṭhānaṁ kho etaṁ, brāhmaṇa, anavakāso yaṁ asappuriso asappurisaṁ jāneyya—
an4:187.3.5_0: Etampi kho, brāhmaṇa, aṭṭhānaṁ anavakāso yaṁ asappuriso sappurisaṁ jāneyya—
an4:187.3.7_0: Ṭhānaṁ kho etaṁ, brāhmaṇa, vijjati yaṁ sappuriso sappurisaṁ jāneyya—
an4:187.3.9_0: Etampi kho, brāhmaṇa, ṭhānaṁ vijjati yaṁ sappuriso asappurisaṁ jāneyya—
an4:187.4.1_0: Ekamidaṁ, bho gotama, samayaṁ todeyyassa brāhmaṇassa parisati parūpārambhaṁ vattenti:
an4:187.4.2_0: ‘bālo ayaṁ rājā eḷeyyo samaṇe rāmaputte abhippasanno,
an4:187.4.2_1: samaṇe ca pana rāmaputte evarūpaṁ paramanipaccakāraṁ karoti,
an4:187.4.4_0: yamako moggallo uggo nāvindakī gandhabbo aggivesso,
an4:187.4.4_2: samaṇe ca pana rāmaputte evarūpaṁ paramanipaccakāraṁ karonti,
an4:187.4.5_0: Tyāssudaṁ todeyyo brāhmaṇo iminā nayena neti.
an4:187.4.7_0: paṇḍito rājā eḷeyyo karaṇīyādhikaraṇīyesu vacanīyādhivacanīyesu alamatthadasatarehi alamatthadasataro’ti?

an4:187.6.3_0: yamako moggallo uggo nāvindakī gandhabbo aggivesso,
an4:187.6.5_0: yamako moggallo uggo nāvindakī gandhabbo aggivesso,
an4:187.7.1_1: samaṇo rāmaputto rañño eḷeyyassa parihārakehi paṇḍitehi paṇḍitataro karaṇīyādhikaraṇīyesu vacanīyādhivacanīyesu
an4:187.7.1_3: tasmā rañño eḷeyyassa parihārakā samaṇe rāmaputte abhippasannā;
an4:187.7.2_0: samaṇe ca pana rāmaputte evarūpaṁ paramanipaccakāraṁ karonti,
an4:187.8.1_0: Acchariyaṁ, bho gotama, abbhutaṁ, bho gotama.
an4:187.8.3_0: ‘aṭṭhānaṁ kho etaṁ, brāhmaṇa, anavakāso yaṁ asappuriso asappurisaṁ jāneyya—
an4:187.8.5_0: Etampi kho, brāhmaṇa, aṭṭhānaṁ anavakāso yaṁ asappuriso sappurisaṁ jāneyya—
an4:187.8.7_0: Ṭhānaṁ kho etaṁ, brāhmaṇa, vijjati yaṁ sappuriso sappurisaṁ jāneyya—
an4:187.8.9_0: Etampi kho, brāhmaṇa, ṭhānaṁ vijjati yaṁ sappuriso asappurisaṁ jāneyya—
an4:187.8.11_0: Handa ca dāni mayaṁ, bho gotama, gacchāma.
an4:187.9.1_0: Atha kho vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmīti.
an4:188.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
an4:188.1.2_0: Atha kho upako maṇḍikāputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an4:188.1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho upako maṇḍikāputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
an4:188.2.2_0: ‘yo koci parūpārambhaṁ vatteti, parūpārambhaṁ vattento sabbo so na upapādeti.
an4:188.2.7_0: evamevaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, ummujjamānakoyeva bhagavatā mahatā vādapāsena baddho”ti.
an4:188.3.2_0: Tattha aparimāṇā padā aparimāṇā byañjanā aparimāṇā tathāgatassa dhammadesanā—
an4:188.3.4_0: Taṁ kho panidaṁ akusalaṁ pahātabbanti kho, upaka, mayā paññattaṁ.
an4:188.3.5_0: Tattha aparimāṇā padā aparimāṇā byañjanā aparimāṇā tathāgatassa dhammadesanā—
an4:188.4.1_0: Idaṁ kusalanti kho, upaka, mayā paññattaṁ.
an4:188.4.2_0: Tattha aparimāṇā padā aparimāṇā byañjanā aparimāṇā tathāgatassa dhammadesanā—
an4:188.4.4_0: Taṁ kho panidaṁ kusalaṁ bhāvetabbanti kho, upaka, mayā paññattaṁ.
an4:188.4.5_0: Tattha aparimāṇā padā aparimāṇā byañjanā aparimāṇā tathāgatassa dhammadesanā—
an4:188.5.1_0: Atha kho upako maṇḍikāputto bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā
an4:188.5.1_1: padakkhiṇaṁ katvā yena rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto tenupasaṅkami;
an4:188.5.1_2: upasaṅkamitvā yāvatako ahosi bhagavatā saddhiṁ kathāsallāpo taṁ sabbaṁ rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa ārocesi.
an4:188.5.2_0: Evaṁ vutte, rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto kupito anattamano upakaṁ maṇḍikāputtaṁ etadavoca:
an4:188.5.3_0: “yāva dhaṁsī vatāyaṁ loṇakāradārako yāva mukharo yāva pagabbo yatra hi nāma taṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ āsādetabbaṁ maññissati;
an4:188.5.4_0: apehi tvaṁ, upaka, vinassa, mā taṁ addasan”ti.
an4:189.1.7_0: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā kāyena sacchikaraṇīyā?
an4:189.2.1_0: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā satiyā sacchikaraṇīyā?
an4:189.3.1_0: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā cakkhunā sacchikaraṇīyā?
an4:189.4.1_0: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā paññāya sacchikaraṇīyā?
an4:189.4.3_0: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro sacchikaraṇīyā dhammā”ti.
an4:190.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde.
an4:190.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisinno hoti.
an4:190.1.3_0: Atha kho bhagavā tuṇhībhūtaṁ tuṇhībhūtaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ anuviloketvā bhikkhū āmantesi:
an4:190.2.1_0: “Apalāpāyaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā nippalāpāyaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā suddhā sāre patiṭṭhitā.
an4:190.2.2_0: Tathārūpo ayaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhusaṅgho, tathārūpāyaṁ, bhikkhave, parisā.
an4:190.2.4_0: Yathārūpā parisā āhuneyyā pāhuneyyā dakkhiṇeyyā añjalikaraṇīyā anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa,
an4:190.2.5_0: Yathārūpāya parisāya appaṁ dinnaṁ bahu hoti bahu dinnaṁ bahutaraṁ,
an4:190.2.6_0: Yathārūpaṁ parisaṁ alaṁ yojanagaṇanānipi dassanāya gantuṁ api puṭosenāpi,
an4:190.3.1_0: Santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe devappattā viharanti;
an4:190.3.2_0: santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe brahmappattā viharanti;
an4:190.3.3_0: santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe āneñjappattā viharanti;
an4:190.3.4_0: santi, bhikkhave, bhikkhū imasmiṁ bhikkhusaṅghe ariyappattā viharanti.
an4:190.4.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati;
an4:190.4.4_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu devappatto hoti.
an4:190.5.2_2: bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati,
an4:190.5.2_3: tathā dutiyaṁ tathā tatiyaṁ tathā catutthaṁ.
an4:190.5.2_4: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
an4:190.5.5_0: upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṁ disaṁ pharitvā viharati,
an4:190.5.5_1: tathā dutiyaṁ tathā tatiyaṁ tathā catutthaṁ.
an4:190.5.5_2: Iti uddhamadho tiriyaṁ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṁ lokaṁ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena
an4:190.5.6_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu brahmappatto hoti.
an4:190.6.2_2: bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ‘ananto
an4:190.6.3_0: Sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘anantaṁ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4:190.6.4_0: Sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4:190.6.5_0: Sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
an4:190.6.6_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āneñjappatto hoti.
an4:190.7.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ariyappatto hotī”ti.
an4:191.1.4_0: suttaṁ, geyyaṁ, veyyākaraṇaṁ, gāthaṁ, udānaṁ, itivuttakaṁ, jātakaṁ, abbhutadhammaṁ, vedallaṁ.
an4:191.1.5_0: Tassa te dhammā sotānugatā honti, vacasā paricitā, manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
an4:191.1.6_0: So muṭṭhassati kālaṁ kurumāno aññataraṁ devanikāyaṁ upapajjati.
an4:191.1.9_0: atha so satto khippaṁyeva visesagāmī hoti.

an4:191.2.1_0: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhammaṁ pariyāpuṇāti—

an4:191.2.3_0: Tassa te dhammā sotānugatā honti, vacasā paricitā, manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.

an4:192.2.2_0: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
an4:192.2.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, puggalo puggalena saddhiṁ saṁvasamāno evaṁ jānāti:
an4:192.2.4_0: ‘dīgharattaṁ kho ayamāyasmā khaṇḍakārī chiddakārī sabalakārī kammāsakārī,
an4:192.3.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, puggalo puggalena saddhiṁ saṁvasamāno evaṁ jānāti:
an4:192.3.2_0: ‘dīgharattaṁ kho ayamāyasmā akhaṇḍakārī acchiddakārī asabalakārī akammāsakārī santatakārī santatavutti;
an4:192.3.4_9: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
an4:192.4.2_0: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
an4:192.4.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, puggalo puggalena saddhiṁ saṁvoharamāno evaṁ jānāti:
an4:192.4.4_0: ‘aññathā kho ayamāyasmā ekena eko voharati, aññathā dvīhi, aññathā tīhi, aññathā sambahulehi;
an4:192.5.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, puggalo puggalena saddhiṁ saṁvoharamāno evaṁ jānāti:
an4:192.5.2_0: ‘yatheva kho ayamāyasmā ekena eko voharati, tathā dvīhi, tathā tīhi, tathā sambahulehi.
an4:192.5.5_9: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
an4:192.6.2_0: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
an4:192.6.3_4: rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭho samāno na iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an4:192.6.4_0: ‘tathābhūto kho ayaṁ lokasannivāso tathābhūto ayaṁ attabhāvapaṭilābho yathābhūte lokasannivāse yathābhūte
an4:192.6.4_1: attabhāvapaṭilābhe aṭṭha lokadhammā lokaṁ anuparivattanti loko ca aṭṭha lokadhamme anuparivattati—
an4:192.6.5_0: lābho ca, alābho ca, yaso ca, ayaso ca, nindā ca, pasaṁsā ca, sukhañca, dukkhañcā’ti.
an4:192.6.6_0: So ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭho samāno bhogabyasanena vā phuṭṭho samāno rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭho samāno socati kilamati paridevati,
an4:192.7.1_2: ekacco ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭho samāno bhogabyasanena vā phuṭṭho samāno rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭho samāno iti paṭisañcikkhati:
an4:192.7.2_0: ‘tathābhūto kho ayaṁ lokasannivāso tathābhūto ayaṁ attabhāvapaṭilābho yathābhūte lokasannivāse yathābhūte
an4:192.7.2_1: attabhāvapaṭilābhe aṭṭha lokadhammā lokaṁ anuparivattanti loko ca aṭṭha lokadhamme anuparivattati—
an4:192.7.3_0: lābho ca, alābho ca, yaso ca, ayaso ca, nindā ca, pasaṁsā ca, sukhañca, dukkhañcā’ti.
an4:192.7.4_0: So ñātibyasanena vā phuṭṭho samāno bhogabyasanena vā phuṭṭho samāno rogabyasanena vā phuṭṭho samāno na socati na kilamati na paridevati,
an4:192.7.6_0: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
an4:192.8.2_0: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
an4:192.8.3_0: Idha, bhikkhave, puggalo puggalena saddhiṁ sākacchāyamāno evaṁ jānāti:
an4:192.8.4_0: ‘yathā kho imassa āyasmato ummaggo yathā ca abhinīhāro yathā ca pañhāsamudāhāro,
an4:192.8.6_0: Tathā hi ayamāyasmā na ceva gambhīraṁ atthapadaṁ udāharati santaṁ paṇītaṁ atakkāvacaraṁ nipuṇaṁ paṇḍitavedanīyaṁ.
an4:192.8.7_0: Yañca ayamāyasmā dhammaṁ bhāsati tassa ca nappaṭibalo saṅkhittena vā vitthārena vā atthaṁ ācikkhituṁ
an4:192.8.7_1: desetuṁ paññāpetuṁ paṭṭhapetuṁ vivarituṁ vibhajituṁ uttānīkātuṁ.
an4:192.9.1_2: cakkhumā puriso udakarahadassa tīre ṭhito passeyya parittaṁ macchaṁ ummujjamānaṁ.
an4:192.9.3_0: ‘yathā kho imassa macchassa ummaggo yathā ca ūmighāto yathā ca vegāyitattaṁ,
an4:192.9.4_0: Evamevaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo puggalena saddhiṁ sākacchāyamāno evaṁ jānāti:
an4:192.9.5_0: ‘yathā kho imassa āyasmato ummaggo yathā ca abhinīhāro yathā ca pañhāsamudāhāro,
an4:192.9.7_0: Tathā hi ayamāyasmā na ceva gambhīraṁ atthapadaṁ udāharati santaṁ paṇītaṁ atakkāvacaraṁ nipuṇaṁ paṇḍitavedanīyaṁ.
an4:192.9.8_1: tassa ca na paṭibalo saṅkhittena vā vitthārena vā atthaṁ ācikkhituṁ desetuṁ paññāpetuṁ paṭṭhapetuṁ vivarituṁ vibhajituṁ uttānīkātuṁ.
